New Records: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 39 points in 29 minutes
Key Match Events: Oklahoma City had a 36-12 run in the first half en route to a 70-43 lead
Isaiah Joe added 23 of his 31 points in the first half for the Thunder
Post-Match Reflections: There was no hangover at Madison Square Garden
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Oklahoma City Thunder bounced back from a 15-game winning streak being snapped
